welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Savenay, a charming city known for its historic architecture and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Savenay has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montoir Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights within France.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
